title: Who was the first Christian to die? - Quora

response.answer_text: Strictly speaking we don’t know because most of the earliest Christians are not known by name and their deaths were not recorded (or if they were the record was not recopied over and over and so lost now). We don’t generally include Jesus as worshiping himself; Paul lists the earliest to have the Resurrection Experience but lists a group of hundreds without name. Elsewhere he notes that some had “gone asleep” but again without name. Stephen was the first martyr but statistics alone suggest others would have died before he did from natural causes.
